channel.title: Lab 1 on taskcat workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Lab 1 on taskcat workshop

item.title: Build .taskcat.yml
item.description: What you will do in this lab: Open the .taskcat.yml in lab_assets/start/lab1/cfn_project Note scheme validation is plugged into vscode

item.title: Add a project section
item.description: Add a project section for the value of name: specify the name of the project folder project: name: cfn-project

item.title: Add a test section
item.description: Add a test section define a test mytest specfiy the name of your template: lab1.template.yaml define the region: you want to test (for now just specifiy one) us-east-1 add the parameters: this template does not require any parameters so just {} (to specify no params) tests: mytest: template: lab1.template.yaml regions: - us-east-1 parameters: {}
